text.text:
It’s been a month since our stay here, and I still think about how smooth and pleasant the entire experience was. I was in town for a training program which was scheduled for 3 days and travelled with my mother and infant, so I was initially worried about how comfortable things would be—but my stay at Lemon tree exceeded all expectations. From check-in to check-out, everything was smooth, professional, and genuinely welcoming.

The staff were incredibly kind and accommodating, especially knowing I had a baby with me. They made sure we had everything we needed. My mother also felt very at ease—she was able to relax and take care of the baby while I attended my sessions.

The room was spacious, clean, and very baby-friendly. Housekeeping was thoughtful and respectful of our schedule, which helped a lot with nap times. Would like to specially mention Ms Asueno from housekeeping and Mr Kamal at front desk who was very much helpful.

Food was delicious and had options that suited all of us, including soft and fresh items that worked well for my mom and baby.

Even a month later, I can confidently say it was one of the most stress-free hotel stays I’ve had, and I’m so grateful for how well we were treated. Highly recommended for anyone traveling with family, especially with young children.

text.text:
From the moment we arrived at hotel, we knew we were in for a special experience. The level of service exceeded all my expectations. We were warmly welcomed by the front desk staff Ms. Mamta, who made the check-in process smooth and stress-free. Not only did they accommodate my request for an early check-in, but they also graciously offered a late check-out, allowing me to enjoy my stay without feeling rushed.

To our delight, we were upgraded to a higher-category room, which truly enhanced our experience. The room was spacious, beautifully decorated, and spotlessly clean, with thoughtful amenities.

Throughout our stay, every staff member we encountered were courteous, professional, and eager to assist with anything we needed. It’s rare to find a team so dedicated to ensuring each guest feels valued and cared for.

Overall, our experience at ITC Kakatiya was exceptional. The combination of outstanding service, generous accommodations, and genuine hospitality made our visit truly memorable. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking comfort, convenience, and an elevated level of care. We will definitely be returning on our next trip!

text.text:
Disappointing Experience at Golconda Resorts & Spa – Not Worth the Price

I recently stayed at Golconda Resorts & Spa for 2 days with my family. We had booked 4 rooms and were allotted the Palm Villas, each priced at ₹15,000 per night — shockingly higher than many 5-star hotels in Hyderabad.

Unfortunately, the experience was far from premium. The rooms were in a pathetic condition. There is no proper drainage system; the showers were clogged and only 2 holes were functioning, with bore water full of waste. The bathtubs are directly connected to drainage pipes without filters, making them unusable and unhygienic. The bathrooms were sinking, and the foul smell even entered the bedrooms.

When I raised these concerns the next morning, the front desk casually said all rooms are like this and that they were sold out — clearly showing no interest in customer satisfaction.

Room service was equally poor. You need to call multiple times before anyone even responds. For a place that charges premium prices, the service and quality are severely lacking.

I do not recommend this resort to anyone. It’s overpriced, poorly maintained, and not even close to basic hospitality standards.

text.text:
Beautiful place with great service, but food needs improvement

Golconda Resort is a lovely getaway — the location is scenic, peaceful, and well-maintained. The ambiance and layout really make it feel like a relaxing retreat.

However, the food was a bit underwhelming, especially considering the pricing. The taste and variety could definitely be better. When we raised our concerns, the staff handled it well — polite, responsive, and eager to help, which we appreciated.

Overall, a great place to relax and enjoy the atmosphere, but there’s room for improvement when it comes to the dining experience.

text.text:
We were a group of four who came to this hotel with the intention of dining, and we had even arranged to meet others there. However, our experience was extremely disappointing and unprofessional from the moment we arrived.

As soon as we walked in, we were treated with hostility. Instead of being welcomed and given a menu, we were told to “stand up and pick your food from over there,” as if we were not guests but an inconvenience. No menu was provided, and the staff were rude and dismissive.

We only ordered tea, but after witnessing the poor treatment and the lack of organization, we decided to leave immediately. The place lacks proper customer service, basic hospitality, and respect for guests.

If you’re a foreigner or even a local, I strongly advise you not to go to this place. The staff are unprofessional, and the environment is far from welcoming. You deserve better service than what this hotel provides.

text.text: Today I am in Hyderabad and flashed back my Horrible experience of this horrible place few years ago. I had forgotten the incident but i just wanted others to know. The place is not worthy of the price they charge. The images are for marketing purposes only. I had booked a garden villa. There was a snake in the Villa which i had booked 2 days. They shifted us in the main Hotel rooms but there too many lizards were on the bed and on the ceiling. I have changed the room again but it was the same. I have spent a sleepess night there. It was my first anniversary plus first Valentine day as a couple so i didn't want to ruin the day. So i wanted to cancel the booking for the next day but they said it's against their policy & can't refund however they promised me that "whenever" i visit there i can complete remaining booking & said that they have all the records in computer. After few months i just called them back that i am coming there, they totally turned away & and started shouting at me that they have never promised such thing. I didn't want to argue and ruin my another visit to the beautiful City. I just let it go. Staff, Place and the Food all are horrible.

editorialSummary.text: Chic rooms & suites in a polished hotel featuring 5 dining options, plus a bar, a spa & 3 pools.

text.text:
The service was impeccable. Staff were proactive, attentive, and made guests feel welcome. The room was spacious, spotless, and comfortable, with the Heavenly Bed providing a perfect night's sleep. The well-appointed bathroom and powerful shower were also a welcome luxury.
The hotel's dining options were a highlight. The extensive breakfast buffet at Seasonal Tastes offered a wide variety of healthy and delicious choices. Fresh juices and smoothies were available, another nod to the hotel's focus on wellness.
The location is ideal for business travelers, situated within the bustling Mindspace IT Park. It's a convenient and peaceful base amidst the city's energy.
Overall, The Westin Hyderabad Mindspace exceeded expectations. The combination of exceptional service, a clean and comfortable environment, and a genuine commitment to guest wellness—including the small, refreshing touches that encourage hydration—made for a truly restorative stay. Future trips to Hyderabad will include a stay at this hotel.

From the moment I arrived, the front desk staff set the tone for the stay with their expeditious service. text.text:
Park Hyatt is one of the addresses for hospitality, still warm, still appreciative, but with that extra sprinkle of spice to tickle the funny bone. The staff's humor added a delightful touch to the experience.
If hospitality were an Olympic sport, this dream team would’ve taken home the gold, silver, and the buffet table.
Let’s start with Kareena, the receptionist, and Raj, the Duty Manager, who managed duties, guests, and occasional mood swings (mine, not hers) with the grace of a ballet dancer and the precision of a Swiss watch. Their ability to fix a problem before it even thought of becoming one made me feel like a truly valued guest.
At the front office, Abid and Abu were like Batman and Robin regarding guest relations. Need a room change? Done. Did you lose your key card? Found. Existential crisis? Well, they’d at least offer you tea with a reassuring smile.
Avinash, the F&B Manager, ensured I never left the dining area hungry—or skinny. Every meal felt like a Michelin-starred cheat day, and I didn’t complain once. My diet did, though. Loudly.
Then came Mr. Gerald, RM of Rika, a guide, who explained how to explore Hyatt points and membership, while Mukesh, our restaurant livewire.
Over at the fitness centre, Karthik tried valiantly to undo the damage caused by Avinash’s delicious sabotage. Whether it was treadmill therapy or gentle guilt-tripping, he had me moving—and miraculously smiling guide to his domain.
Rakesh Bhandari transformed breakfast into a daily celebration. I thought I was just grabbing toast and eggs, but no—he served joy with a side of “Try this too!” Every morning felt like brunch at grandma’s as if grandma were a gourmet chef with five-star charm.
And then, Krishna Rana. Not just a chef but a culinary wizard slash philosopher. Our conversations went from recipes to the meaning of life, all while he casually whipped up magic on a plate.
This band of pampering professionals didn’t just make my stay comfortable—they turned it into a sitcom, a food documentary, and a luxury retreat. Their dedication and humor made every moment a memorable experience.
If the home is where the heart is, then this place felt like a warm hug from a five-star hotel wrapped in laughter, good food, and people who genuinely care.

text.text:
We lived in room 1415, and the hotel was amazing! The service and the staff there were the best, helping us at every step of the way.

The location of the hotel in the heart of Hyderabad's financial district was also perfect. We had amazing views of the nearby skyline, and beautiful peacocks dancing in the thickets next to the hotel.

The food offered (Especially for breakfast) was extensive and very tasty, making it by far the most memorable part of our stay.

While our experience was amazing and memorable, the cleanliess aspect was a bit lacking. The rooms were relatively clean, but stains on the bedsheets made me questions if Sheraton Hyderabad really deserves its 5 star reputation. The bathrooms too were not very well cleaned, with stains all over.

In conclusion, the visit was pleasant, but did not meet my expectations (Hygiene is a big thing for me). Hope the hotel management looks into the issue, and takes necessary action!

text.text:
Thank You for a Wonderful Staycation at Hyatt Hotel!

I recently had the pleasure of spending a staycation at the Hyatt, and I must say, it was an incredible experience from start to finish! The hotel offered everything I was looking for in a perfect getaway, with outstanding service.

The breakfast spread was absolutely delicious, with a variety of options that catered to all tastes. From fresh pastries to hot dishes, every item was prepared to perfection, and it was the perfect way to start my day.

Every team member went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable. They were friendly, attentive, and always ready to assist with a smile, which made me feel right at home. It’s clear that the Hyatt values its guests and puts a great emphasis on hospitality.

Overall, I had an amazing time and will definitely be recommending this hotel to friends and family. Thank you, Hyatt, for delivering such a memorable and relaxing experience! I'll certainly be back for another stay soon.

Special thanks to Mr. Saurabh from restaurant manager and his team member named mr. Suraj & ms. Rakhi and housekeeping staff mr. Nitesh once again thank you for delivering best services.

editorialSummary.text: Modest rooms with wet rooms in a basic hotel featuring a restaurant & a rooftop dining room.

text.text:
Hotel NS Royal Emirates – A Must-Stay in Hyderabad!
I have stayed at Hotel NS Royal Emirates 4–5 times, and every time my experience has been absolutely amazing. This is truly one of the top hotels in Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad. The location is perfect – easily accessible and in one of the most premium areas of the city.
The staff is extremely polite, professional, and always ready to help, which makes you feel at home. Their hospitality is outstanding. The rooms are clean, spacious, and well-maintained, offering everything you need for a comfortable stay.
One of the best things about this hotel is the owner – such a humble and helpful person who ensures that guests have the best experience. This personal touch makes a huge difference.
If you are planning to visit Hyderabad, staying at Hotel NS Royal Emirates is a must! It’s a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and excellent service.
Highly recommended! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

text.text:
DISGRACEFUL EXPERIENCE – RUDE STAFF, FAKE REVIEWS & OVERPRICED, DIRTY ROOMS

Staying at Ella Hotel, Gachibowli, Hyderabad was an absolute disaster. This place is the textbook example of how a hotel should NOT be run.

Let’s start with the staff – the front desk receptionists are shockingly rude, arrogant, and completely lack even basic communication skills. They behave more like goondas than hospitality professionals. No respect, no courtesy, no willingness to help. I’ve never encountered such hostile, untrained behavior in any hotel.

Then there’s the gym trainer, who apparently also maintains the swimming pool. He is completely unprofessional, aggressive, and behaves like a street thug. His presence alone is enough to make guests feel uncomfortable.

The rooms? A joke. Tiny, suffocating, smelly cubes with zero ambience. They charge nearly ₹7000 for what feels like a cheap, budget lodge room. Absolutely no value for money.

And don’t be fooled by the fake positive reviews online. There’s a huge disconnect between the reality and the artificially inflated ratings. It’s obvious many of these reviews are planted – no genuine guest would rate this place highly after what I experienced.

The management is clueless, careless, and full of attitude. Guest complaints are ignored, problems are shrugged off, and there’s zero accountability. This hotel does not value guests at all.

STAY AWAY from this place. It’s overpriced, unprofessional, and borderline hostile. I wouldn’t recommend this hotel to anyone – even if it were free.

My stay at the hotel in Ramoji Film City was absolutely delightful! From the moment we arrived, the hospitality made us feel right at home. The rooms were clean, spacious, and well-maintained with a peaceful ambiance that added to the overall charm of the place.

The food was another highlight — a great mix of local and continental options, served fresh and full of flavor. Every meal felt thoughtfully prepared and catered to all tastes.

The guided tour of the film city was amazing — beautifully organized and packed with fun, information, and picture-perfect spots. The iconic welcome garden and majestic statues added a cinematic flair to the experience.

Overall, it was a memorable getaway filled with great food, scenic views, and excellent service. Highly recommended for families, couples, or anyone looking to escape into a world of movies and relaxation!

text.text:
Excellent 11-Night Stay at Treebo Destination Inn, Hyderabad

I had a wonderful 11-night stay at Treebo Destination Inn in Hyderabad. From check-in to check-out, everything was smooth and hassle-free. The staff were extremely polite, helpful, and professional — always ready to assist with any requests.

The room was clean, comfortable, and well-equipped for a long stay. Housekeeping did a great job maintaining cleanliness every day, and the Wi-Fi was fast and reliable throughout. The complimentary breakfast was a nice touch.

The location is excellent — peaceful yet close to restaurants, shops, and major city spots. Whether you’re here for work or leisure, it’s a very convenient base in Hyderabad.

Special thanks to the Ramesh Kumar, Stephen and Mani for their friendly service and hospitality. I would definitely recommend Treebo Destination Inn to anyone visiting the city, and I look forward to staying here again!

text.text:
We have booked this hotel earlier (had good experience and gave a 5 star rating on Google for that time) and this was my 2nd booking but the experience was not that great. We booked the hotel for 3 days (around 13th Feb) and wanted to do late checkout as our flight was at 6 pm.
Even after multiple requests to accommodate late checkout (2 hrs more), we were told that the room is booked for next guest and other rooms are not available.

We offered to pay for the extra hours but the hotel managers couldn't arrange alternate room just for couple of hours.

We went out and came back to hotel after 3 hrs to collect the luggage & wanted to use restroom. They gave us the same room keys (where we stayed) to use the restroom. We noticed that neither the room was occupied by any guest nor it was cleaned (ready to occupy for next guest). This was shocking, though after multiple requests neither the room was given to us nor it was occupied.

I didn't expect such experience from Treebo which is renowned for its hospitality.
I hope you accomodate request from customers who come with lot of trust and hope trusting your services.

I had enjoyed the stay otherwise as the service and everything was good but this was very disappointing.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Lemon Tree Hotel, Gachibowli, and it was a delightful experience from start to finish.

Location:
The hotel is conveniently situated in the bustling IT hub of Gachibowli, making it an ideal spot for both business and leisure travelers. Major offices and key landmarks are just a short drive away.

Ambience and Cleanliness:
The hotel has a vibrant and welcoming ambiance. The interiors are tastefully designed, exuding warmth with a modern touch. The cleanliness of both the rooms and common areas was impeccable.

Rooms:
My room was spacious, well-maintained, and equipped with all modern amenities, including high-speed Wi-Fi, a comfortable work desk, and plush bedding. The bathroom was spotless, with quality toiletries provided. The view from the room added to the pleasant stay.

Dining Experience:
The in-house restaurant, Citrus Café, offers a variety of delectable dishes spanning multiple cuisines. I especially enjoyed their breakfast buffet, which had a vast selection of fresh fruits, pastries, South Indian delicacies, and made-to-order dishes. The service staff ensured a wonderful dining experience.

Service:
The staff at Lemon Tree went above and beyond to ensure comfort. From the prompt check-in process to the personalized attention during the stay, I was thoroughly impressed. Special shout-out to the front desk and housekeeping teams for their professionalism.

Amenities:
The gym was well-equipped and clean, making it easy to maintain a fitness routine. The hotel's swimming pool was a great place to relax. Business travelers will appreciate the conference rooms and work-friendly spaces.

Accessibility:
The hotel offers ample parking and transportation services. Ride-hailing services are easily available, making it convenient to explore Hyderabad.

Overall Experience:
Lemon Tree Hotel, Gachibowli, exceeded my expectations. Whether you're in Hyderabad for business or leisure, this hotel strikes the perfect balance between comfort, convenience, and hospitality. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a premium yet reasonably priced stay.

It's a fantastic property - very luxurious and hospitable like most ITCs are. We stayed at the Nizam suite, located at the 15th floor. The suite was very spacious and had all amenities you could think of including a kitchen, a dining area, a lounging/reading area, walk in closet, a Jacuzzi, a master bedroom and living area. The property is surrounded by green landscape and over looks the Hussain Sagar Lake
The hospitality is top notch and the staff is very friendly. Few things that could improve is the food quality/taste for in-room dining and the breakfast buffet.
Overall, we are pretty happy with out stay and would love to be back when possible.

From the moment we arrived at hotel, we knew we were in for a special experience. The level of service exceeded all my expectations. We were warmly welcomed by the front desk staff Ms. Mamta, who made the check-in process smooth and stress-free. Not only did they accommodate my request for an early check-in, but they also graciously offered a late check-out, allowing me to enjoy my stay without feeling rushed.

To our delight, we were upgraded to a higher-category room, which truly enhanced our experience. The room was spacious, beautifully decorated, and spotlessly clean, with thoughtful amenities.

Throughout our stay, every staff member we encountered were courteous, professional, and eager to assist with anything we needed. It’s rare to find a team so dedicated to ensuring each guest feels valued and cared for.

Overall, our experience at ITC Kakatiya was exceptional. The combination of outstanding service, generous accommodations, and genuine hospitality made our visit truly memorable. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking comfort, convenience, and an elevated level of care. We will definitely be returning on our next trip!

highlightedText.text: "This room had a living room, private pool, and a stone-made bathtub."

text.text:
We stayed at a luxurious private suite at Golconda Resorts & Spa. The staff and maintenance team are very well-trained and courteous. This room had a living room, private pool, and a stone-made bathtub. It was a rather expensive stay for one night (Rs. 35,000 incl. taxes) so we expected luxurious service and food. However, when we reached the room, the bathtub was not working adequately. The washer seemed to have been missing and subsequently, the water kept leaking. Despite this, the maintenance staff did solve this problem within a few hours. Furthermore, we couldn't watch Netflix on either of their televisions as they were not equipped with those applications despite being "smart TVs".

I have stayed at various 4+ star resorts and hotels in numerous countries. But I have never experienced a luxurious resort not offer complementary services such as breakfast.

The resort is riddled with overpriced items all across the board - from the menu to the room tariffs. The in-room dining experience was quicker than we expected although they seem to charge you at your doorstep rather than at checkout.

It seems to me that this property is in enormous debt, trying to net profit by overcharging their customers (e.g. one glass of juice costs 400 bucks). The problem with this property lies within the upper management and owner(s) who cannot figure out how to run such a luxurious resort without losing money every day.

I don't mind paying exorbitant amounts if the service is done rightly so, however, this was a disappointment.

I recently stayed at the Westin Mindspace hotel during a business trip to Hyderabad, and I was thoroughly impressed with my experience. From the moment I walked in the door, I was struck by the hotel's sleek and modern design, which perfectly blended luxury and functionality.

One of the things that really stood out to me about the Westin Mindspace was the level of service I received. The staff was incredibly friendly, helpful, and accommodating, and they went out of their way to ensure that my stay was as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. From the front desk to the restaurant to the housekeeping staff, everyone I interacted with was professional and attentive, special mention of Riya from F&B department, Ishita from front desk and Karan from gym section.

All in all, I can't recommend the Westin Mindspace hotel highly enough. Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, this hotel is the perfect choice for a luxurious and enjoyable stay in Hyderabad.

text.text:
I had an absolutely incredible stay at the Park Hyatt Hyderabad—a true five-star experience from start to finish.

From the moment I arrived, the front desk staff set the tone for the stay with their expeditious service. I was in a rush for a video work call, and they ensured my check-in was seamless and efficient, getting me to my room in under 10 minutes—something I truly appreciated. This was consistent for my entire team which was traveling with me.

Beyond the smooth check-in, the restaurants at the hotel exceeded all expectations. The culinary team frequently went above and beyond, even bringing out the chef personally to accommodate modifications and ensure I had exactly what I wanted. Breakfast was a standout—always served with a warm smile and a team that took hospitality to another level.

The rooms were immaculate, incredibly comfortable, and the hotel itself was spotless. Every detail—from the luxurious accommodations to the attentive service—was top-notch.

text.text:
We lived in room 1415, and the hotel was amazing! The service and the staff there were the best, helping us at every step of the way.

The location of the hotel in the heart of Hyderabad's financial district was also perfect. We had amazing views of the nearby skyline, and beautiful peacocks dancing in the thickets next to the hotel.

The food offered (Especially for breakfast) was extensive and very tasty, making it by far the most memorable part of our stay.

While our experience was amazing and memorable, the cleanliess aspect was a bit lacking. The rooms were relatively clean, but stains on the bedsheets made me questions if Sheraton Hyderabad really deserves its 5 star reputation. The bathrooms too were not very well cleaned, with stains all over.

In conclusion, the visit was pleasant, but did not meet my expectations (Hygiene is a big thing for me). Hope the hotel management looks into the issue, and takes necessary action!

text.text:
The Sheraton Hyderabad Hotel is a stunning property located in the heart of Hyderabad, India. From the moment you arrive, you are struck by the impressive building aesthetics and the hotel's commitment to sustainability.

The hotel's design is a modern interpretation of traditional Indian architecture, with a sleek and contemporary feel. The exterior features a mix of glass, concrete and local stone, while the interior is decorated with warm colors, rich textiles, and beautiful artwork. The lobby is spacious and welcoming, with a grand staircase leading up to the guest rooms.

One thing that sets the Sheraton Hyderabad Hotel apart from other luxury properties is its commitment to sustainability. The hotel is LEED certified, which means it meets strict environmental standards for energy efficiency, water conservation, and waste reduction. This is reflected in the hotel's carbon footprint, which is significantly lower than other hotels of similar size and luxury.

The guest rooms at the Sheraton Hyderabad Hotel are spacious and well-appointed, with comfortable beds, plush linens, and all the amenities you would expect from a five-star property. The bathrooms are modern and sleek, with luxurious rainfall showers and high-quality toiletries. The rooms offer beautiful views of the city and are equipped with state-of-the-art technology, including high-speed internet and flat-screen TVs.

In terms of dining, the Sheraton Hyderabad Hotel offers a range of options to suit all tastes. The Feast restaurant serves an extensive buffet breakfast and dinner, while the Italian restaurant Bene offers delicious pasta dishes and wood-fired pizzas. The hotel's signature restaurant, the Deori, serves traditional Indian cuisine in a beautiful setting with stunning views of the city.

Overall, the Sheraton Hyderabad Hotel is an exceptional property that offers luxury and sustainability in equal measure. Its beautiful building aesthetics, commitment to reducing its carbon footprint, and detailed physical description make it a must-visit destination for anyone visiting Hyderabad.

text.text:
The Hyatt Hyderabad Gachibowli is a stylish and contemporary hotel located in the bustling business district of Hyderabad, India. From the moment you enter the lobby, you are struck by the sleek and modern building aesthetics that reflect the hotel's commitment to sustainability.

The exterior of the Hyatt Hyderabad Gachibowli features a mix of glass and steel, with clean lines and a striking architectural design. The interior is equally impressive, with a spacious and welcoming lobby that features high ceilings, modern furnishings, and beautiful artwork.

The hotel's commitment to sustainability is evident in its carbon footprint, which is significantly lower than other hotels of similar size and luxury. The Hyatt Hyderabad Gachibowli is LEED certified, which means it meets strict environmental standards for energy efficiency, water conservation, and waste reduction.

The guest rooms at the Hyatt Hyderabad Gachibowli are well-appointed and comfortable, with plush bedding, modern furnishings, and all the amenities you would expect from a five-star property. The bathrooms are modern and sleek, with high-quality toiletries and luxurious rainfall showers. The rooms offer stunning views of the city and are equipped with state-of-the-art technology, including high-speed internet and flat-screen TVs.

In terms of dining, the Hyatt Hyderabad Gachibowli offers a range of options to suit all tastes. The Collage restaurant serves a delicious buffet breakfast and dinner, while the Italian restaurant, Deori, offers delicious pasta dishes and wood-fired pizzas. The hotel's signature restaurant, The Lounge, serves innovative cocktails and light bites in a relaxed and sophisticated setting.

Overall, the Hyatt Hyderabad Gachibowli is an exceptional property that offers luxury and sustainability in equal measure. Its building aesthetics, commitment to reducing its carbon footprint, and detailed physical description make it a must-visit destination for anyone visiting Hyderabad.

text.text: Dash Hotel is a hidden gem in the Kacheguda area of Hyderabad. I've stayed here numerous times and keep returning because the place is in a quiet location, the staff are fantastic and courteous and the rooms are well maintained and clean. There is nothing more you need from a hotel in India, everything works and the hot water is piping hot. While the hotel doesn't have a restaurant they are more than happy to get food for you if you ask.

text.text: I stayed with a colleague at Dash Hotels during a two-week work trip. The rooms were comfortable and spacious with all necessary facilities that were well-maintained, also including fast WiFi. The staff was very helpful and friendly, especially the manager Sanjeev who even exchanged money for us. We had a little trouble in the beginning with transferring the money as we checked in during the night, but the manager was very understanding. Keep in mind that they do not accept credit cards, only wire transfers in advance and cash payments upon check-in. There is a small kitchen next to the reception that can be used for cooking. Near the hotel is a large shopping mall with a supermarket, and the hotel was also close to a good vegan restaurant as well as a shopping street and a bazar. I recommend booking this hotel if you want to stay in the area!

text.text:
An Unforgettable Stay at Hotel Sitara, Ramoji Film City

We recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Sitara, Luxury Hotel at Ramoji Film City, during a two-day convention held at the stunning London Street. From the moment we stepped into this magnificent property, we were captivated by its serene ambiance, panoramic views, and impeccable hospitality. This hotel truly redefines the meaning of luxury and customer service, leaving us with memories to cherish for a lifetime.

The ambiance of Hotel Sitara is an absolute treat for the senses. The thoughtfully designed interiors exude elegance, while the calming aesthetics are perfectly complemented by the lush surroundings of Ramoji Film City. Whether relaxing by the poolside or admiring the breathtaking views from the room, the setting provides a sense of peace and tranquility that is hard to find elsewhere.

Exceptional Service Beyond Expectations
What truly set our experience apart was the exceptional service provided by the staff. Each team member we interacted with went above and beyond to ensure our stay was comfortable and enjoyable. Two individuals, in particular, stood out for their extraordinary assistance.

During a minor transportation hiccup, the Senior Manager for Wedding Events Marketing demonstrated unparalleled customer service. His prompt action and heartfelt gesture to help us reach our destination were nothing short of remarkable. His kindness and professionalism stole our hearts, and his dedication to guest satisfaction was a testament to the high standards of this establishment.

Another individual who deserves special mention is Mr. Nagesh Hanumandala, the Security Incharge. His spontaneous assistance and commitment to meeting our needs during the convention were genuinely commendable. Whether it was providing directions or ensuring the safety and comfort of all attendees, Mr. Hanumandala showcased the best of customer service with a smile, leaving a lasting impression on us.

Culinary Excellence
The culinary experience at Hotel Sitara was another highlight of our stay. The food was a delightful fusion of flavors, with each dish crafted to perfection. Whether it was the sumptuous buffet spread or the à la carte options, every meal was a gastronomic delight. The attentive staff ensured that all dietary preferences were catered to, adding a personalized touch to our dining experience.

A Complete Package of Luxury and Care
Beyond the luxurious accommodations and delectable food, the hotel’s meticulous attention to detail in all aspects of hospitality made our stay truly exceptional. From the seamless check-in process to the well-maintained amenities and courteous housekeeping staff, every interaction reflected the hotel’s commitment to excellence.

Our visit to Hotel Sitara was not just a stay—it was an experience filled with warmth, care, and genuine hospitality. We sincerely thank the entire team for making our convention and stay so memorable. If you’re visiting Ramoji Film City and seeking a blend of luxury, comfort, and unparalleled service, Hotel Sitara should undoubtedly be your choice. We look forward to returning and reliving the incredible experience this hotel offers!

The team at Abode has a very special knack of making the guests extremely comfortable and they will welcome you like their own. I would strongly recommend that you stay there atleast for two days and get to experience their hospitality and the most delicious breakfast and spa facilities. For me, they have always gone out of their way to help and be so generous in all their gestures even though sometimes I have showed up unannounced. Needless to say, it's walking distance from Colaba's best restaurants, markets, museums and art galleries. Thank you team Abode and see you soon again.

text.text: I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Abode Hydrabad. I was very impressed with the hotel from the moment I arrived. The lobby is large and opulent, and the staff is very welcoming and attentive. Room was spacious and clean, with all the amenities I needed, including a comfortable bed, good quality toiletries, and a fast Wi-Fi connection.

text.text:
I was staying in this hotel as Inwas visiting the city for a corporate workshop. The hotel is located at Lakdikapul Rd, Saifabad, Lakdikapul, Hyderabad, Telangana.

The location of the hotel is in a very crowded area so that at times could become a challenge, there is a market down the road with lot of eateries if you wish to not in the hotel. I was put up in a suite and it was a very good room. The room was clean, well lit and bathroom too was clean. Room service was prompt. Staff is polite and friendly.

This hotel too has a roof top swimming pool and a gym as well.

text.text: We really enjoyed our six days and five nights stay from 27 to 31 Dec. 2024, at hotel Destination Inn. We booked a spacious Superior Double Room through Booking.com. The property is conveniently located in a posh area of Banjara Hills, near Nagarjuna Circle, Hyderabad-34. This hotel is really clean, fully air conditioned, and with free WiFi service among other amenities. GVK One Shopping Mall, Meridian Restaurant, and Jalagam Vengala Rao Park are just 10 minutes walk away from here. Both the reception and service staff were helpful with all our queries and their response was spontaneous. Complimentary breakfast was abundant and delicious. This property is something really beyond our expectations and we would love to thank everyone for making our family holiday trip so special.

text.text:
Nice and Good to stay.

I recently stayed at this hotel and had a pleasant experience overall. The hospitality was excellent, with the staff being courteous, attentive, and always ready to assist. The rooms and common areas were impeccably maintained, reflecting the hotel's commitment to cleanliness and order.

While the hotel does not have an in-house dining facility, ordering food through online delivery apps like Swiggy and Zomato was a convenient alternative, and the staff ensured smooth coordination for food delivery.

If you're looking for a comfortable and clean place to stay with great service, this hotel is a great choice. I’d definitely consider returning for future stays!
